localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Wrekt is a social deduction game meant to be played with groups. Use it to split the bill at the end of a meal or just play for fun!
blogPost.body: Wrekt is a social deduction game meant to be played with groups. Use it to split the bill at the end of a meal or just play for fun!
blogPost.title: Wrekt - A social deduction bill splitting game
blogPost.author: andy wang

localize.description: Wrekt是一款旨在与团队一起玩的社交演绎游戏。在用餐结束时用它来分摊账单，或者只是为了好玩而玩！
localize.tagline: 一个社会扣除额拆分博弈

localize.description: Wrekt是一款旨在與團隊一起玩的社交演繹遊戲。在用餐結束時用它來分攤賬單，或者只是爲了好玩而玩！
localize.tagline: 一個社會扣除額拆分博弈

previous.excerpt: TextBuddy is a Mac app for manipulating text. A Swiss Army knife for plain text that is there when you need it and hidden when you don’t. Faster than your IDE. Easier than the command line. Transform and extract text from images and audio, too.
previous.title: TextBuddy for macOS - A Swiss Army knife for plain text.

localize.description: TextBuddy 是一款用于操作文本的 Mac 应用程序。一把处理纯文本的瑞士军刀，在你需要时出现，在你不需要时隐藏。比你的IDE更快。比命令行更简单。还可以从图像和音频中转换和提取文本。
TextBuddy 是一款用於操作文本的 Mac 應用程序。一把處理純文本的瑞士軍刀，在你需要時出現，在你不需要時隱藏。比你的IDE更快。比命令行更簡單。還可以從圖像和音頻中轉換和提取文本。

next.excerpt: Wavvy is a podcast hosting and analytics platform that is free and open source. Get an RSS feed for iTunes/Spotify, an embeddable audio player, basic analytics, and a customizable one page website. code: https://github.com/toshvelaga/wavvy-clean
next.title: Wavvy - Podcast hosting and analytics

localize.description: Wavvy是一个免费和开源的播客托管和分析平台。获得一个iTunes/Spotify的RSS源，一个可嵌入的音频播放器，基本的分析，以及一个可定制的单页网站。代码：https://github.com/toshvelaga/wavvy-clean。
Wavvy是一個免費和開源的播客託管和分析平臺。獲得一個iTunes/Spotify的RSS源，一個可嵌入的音頻播放器，基本的分析，以及一個可定製的單頁網站。代碼：https://github.com/toshvelaga/wavvy-clean。
